    • checkDatabaseEntries

      public static boolean checkDatabaseEntries​(java.lang.String attributeName, java.lang.String dbTableName)
      Check if there are existing entries in the database table. Otherwise program is stuck in an endless loop.
      Parameters:
      attributeName - Name of the attribute which is counted.
      dbTableName - Name of the database table in which the attribute exists.
      Returns:
      Returns true if there are more than zero entries, otherwise false.

    • isUserFarmer

      public static boolean isUserFarmer()
      Returns:
      Returns true if the logged in user is a farmer, otherwise false.

      Returns:
      Returns the password of the logged in user.
